violation_info.title: Validation Failed
violation_info.detail: csv_file: The mime type of the file is invalid ("application/json"). Allowed mime types are "application/vnd.ms-excel", "application/excel", "application/csv", "application/x-csv", "text/x-comma-separated-values", "text/comma-separated-values", "text/plain", "text/csv", "text/x-csv".

violations.title: The mime type of the file is invalid ("application/json"). Allowed mime types are "application/vnd.ms-excel", "application/excel", "application/csv", "application/x-csv", "text/x-comma-separated-values", "text/comma-separated-values", "text/plain", "text/csv", "text/x-csv".
violations.template: The mime type of the file is invalid ({{ type }}). Allowed mime types are {{ types }}.
